title: Do you think Meghan Markle feels bad about all of this scrutiny and bad press? - Quora
tags: Prince Harry and Meghan Markle Engagement (November 2017)

response.answer_text: Where do these people come from? We have one person answering who says the Duchess is "defiant and obstinate." She also says again, after being called on it before, that the Duchess did not offer to pay her father's expenses and provide housing at the wedding. Hey, do not let the truth stop you! That is, to put it bluntly, just fiction. The Duchess had arranged, before her father sold staged pictures to the press, to give him the same help with travel and housing she had arranged through the Royal family for her mother. The exact same. So the answer saying "Poor Thomas, mistreated and ignored" are based on fantasy. More fantasy - that the Duchess is the only royal whose staff leave. The Queen lost her entire kitchen staff recently, plus others, but you do not see the haters or gutter press mentioning that. The truth is, working for the royals is prestigious, but does not pay well, and the hours are terrible. So people come, work and gain entry to that world, and then go find more lucrative employment. And the weepy answer that says: "a grandfather deserves to celebrate his grandchild," should mention how poor Thomas (I don't care about any of my children or grandchildren) Markle has five grandchildren already. And he sees none of them. And he has a relationship with none of them. Not even a card on their birthdays or a Merry Christmas kid! Nor are those the only family members Thomas (If I cannot sell something about you I don't bother with you) Markle doesn't speak to or bother with; WRONG: he does not speak to his first ex-wife, his second ex-wife, his son, and all five of his grandchildren. Let us say that again: he does not have anything to do, not even speaking to, or sending a card, to two of his own children, and all 5 of his grandchildren. So for the weepy questions asking "Will Meghan Markle’s father be allowed to meet his grandchild after she has the baby?," they should mention he already has 5 grandchildren he ignores. Why would he want to meet his new 6th grandchild since he ignores the other 5? MONEY. Thomas (I don't give two dead flies about my pregnant daughter OR her soon to be child) Markle wants money; all the money he can get from selling his daughter out, and if he could sell his grandchild yet to be out, he would; he tried to extort a photo out of the Duchess in his answer to her letter imploring him to stop lying about her so he could sell that! Thomas (I would sure love to sell an interview about my grandchild, and God I would get a million for a picture of the little money maker!) Markle has no relationship whatsoever with any of his 5 grandchildren now, why would any sane person invite him to sell the new baby's toys? Then we have the Narcissism loons. They don't know the woman. They never met the woman. They only know what you can read in the Mail, or saw on the tube. They have absolutely no training or expertise in psychiatry, but feel entitled to make a diagnosis about someone they never met and never spoke to. They ASSUME a lie based solely on something the media printed. The media prints many things, at least a significant portion of which are absolutely untrue. Their lack of anything approaching knowledge is simply staggering. Further, not that the facts faze them, every single person who worked with the Duchess, every neighbor she had, was questioned by investigators for the Daily Mail and other media organizations. They, unlike the haters, actually know the woman, and not one had a bad word to say about her. What they are doing, is bullying. I have seen bullying go from interpersonal bullying to a particularly vicious kind of anonymous kind of bullying done from the safety of one's home. I am sorry you folks making up mental health diagnoses cannot see that making assumptions about someone you never met, and don't know, and attacking them with a phony "diagnosis" is not just wrong, but despicable. She should mention that

No, I do not. She is defiant and obstinate. Another longtime staff member resigned today. She also asked the Queen if she could have her own separate charity enterprise, Meghan-style. She was denied. Meghan refuses to read what is written about her. "It's just noise,” according to her. It is reported that The Queen has requested that Meghan fix things with her father. She refuses to even consider doing so. I, too, had a complicated relationship with my own father. I remember him making his way into Boston to see my newborn son at the hospital. I was moved and transformed by seeing the love he had for my son and his grandson. I hope Meghan does not deprive herself or her father of this healing moment. If William and Harry can forgive Camilla for her role in destroying their parents’ marriage, I don’t understand why Meghan cannot forgive her father for falling on hard times. He had never met Harry and was not helped with the expenses that would be incurred in attending such a glamorous affair. He was set up to fail. It’s too bad Meghan does not have the generosity of spirit to have a heart to heart with her dad. Harry has had to make peace with his father’s mistress. His mother died at 36, partly because she was forced into the single life. If Harry has the strength to be in Camilla’s presence, perhaps Meghan should learn from him. Harry did not suffer from hurt feelings as Meghan is doing, he actually lost the most central figure in his life at age 12. Mother-Love is magnificent and irreplaceable. I sincerely hope that Meghan gives up the notion that she’s perfect. None of us are but a grandfather deserves to celebrate his grandchild.

I think she finds it abhorrent. For people who didn’t follow her prior to her romance with Prince Harry…there were those of us in the US who were a fan of the TV show suits and for the seven consecutive seasons that she played her character she did a good job and her character was a favorite character in a highly successful TV show on the USA network. It was one of their top rated shows. Prior to that she had starred, I repeat starred, in two Hallmark movies and was in a third British made movie called “anti-social” which was very edgy and the public didn’t take to the film very much because of that, however all three stars one of which was Meghan Markle played the roles very well. she has also had guest star roles in single episodes of various successful television series here in the US. She still collects royalties from all of her past acting work… She made an excess of $5 million off of “suits” alone and is estimated to be worth quite a bit more than that just in her own right prior to her marriage to the prince.She had a very successful lifestyle blog which made her a lot of money from affiliate advertising that attached itself to her blog. And her father Thomas Markle tried to claim that he put her through college. However, documentation shows that she had earned scholarships and worked two side jobs to pay for her college education… All by her self. She earned a bachelors degree with a double major in international studies because she considered working in politics on behalf of women, and theater. She scored, on her own prestigious internship in the US Embassy in Buenos Aires. She went on to lend her voice to the united nations on behalf of the clean water project and became a respected spokes woman in the United Nations for gender equality and was a 2015 keynote speaker to the UN assembly on gender equality and female empowerment. And she came to the table with the royal family financially independent, confident, and a self-made woman who was beholden to nobody. She had no problem admitting where she came from, where she had been, the fact that she had been married before, and felt no need to apologize for having a voice. Up to that point she had been very proud of her father and grateful to both of her parents… But she did not foresee that her father, who owed thousands and thousands of dollars in back taxes & had bolted from the United States and was living across the border in Mexico would see her as a golden goose to profit off of her. That’s a fact that all these people pitying Thomas Markel never touch on… He cheated on his taxes and had to run across the border. The so-called family that claimed that she was now disrespecting them because she was becoming Royal were never family to her when she was growing up… Her sister deeply resented Thomas’s marriage to a black woman and deeply resented Thomas’s love of Megan. Megan made a point of being present when Samantha graduated with her degree but Samantha did not return the favor when Meghan graduated. This shady family that wanted no part of her suddenly came out of the woodwork and have been making money from the price on Megan‘s head ever since making claims that cannot be proven in any way shape or form and why can’t they be proven? Because Megan was never really allowed to have a relationship with them because they didn’t want it. I really believe that a lot of the negative press that Megan and Harry have had to deal with owed its roots to her money grubbing family. And Thomas needs to get his story straight. Right after the wedding, he appeared on good morning Britain and was interviewed by Piers Morgan and he readily admitted he had screwed up with the press but that Harry and Megan had forgiven him, and desperately wanted him to come to the wedding, and had made elaborate preparations to fly him here and grand accommodations for him during his length of stay that was planned. And they continued to talk regularly on the phone up until Thomas announced he was not coming because of a heart problem. Prince William and another member of the royal family actually stated that Megan and Harry were both in tears that Thomas was not coming to the wedding. People have questioned why Harry and Megan didn’t postpone the wedding until Thomas could be here… That’s a ridiculous question. Royal weddings take a lot of planning, guests are invited, the chapel was booked,Frogmoor had to be booked for the reception, and another royal wedding was going to be coming up months after their‘s, which takes enormous planning. But they did plan to change their honeymoon plans to include a trip to the west to see Thomas but then Thomas couldn’t stop talking to the press and making money off of Megan and Harry and the stepsister or half sister got in the act and stirred the pot and making the trip became out of the question. At this date and time so much as happened and the decision has been made that they want to step back and start an independent life. But in the days between the wedding and present day the palace Internet security and their mainline security had to spend a great deal of time carefully going through all of the racist threats coming through the royal social media aimed at Meghan which included threats to her life and the Neo-Nazi assassination threat made against Harry because they viewed him as a race traitor. And you can Google all of that because it is well documented in reliable mainline main stream press. The neo-Nazi group plotting Prince Harry’s assassination were actually discovered, prosecuted, and jailed. As for Thomas Markle and everybody pitying him I don’t understand why the British people pity a man who says that the “Royals owe me and I need to receive a reward” and “I’m going to keep doing interviews and making money ‘cause it’s time to take care of Daddy”. Her half sister Samantha loves to appear on good morning Britain as this demure disabled woman who comes across as well spoken and apologetic for her evil sister Megan and her half brother is giving interviews all for money…. it’s all about getting paid because they want their pot of gold. Piers Morgan never bothers to ask Samantha Markel, the half-sister, why she dared to attack Queen Elizabeth for not giving her father his own coat of arms. When Megan was officially married to prince harry the queen issued her her own coat of arms as a member of the royal family. That is the protocol and tradition. Kate, Duchess of Cambridge was also given a code of arms and because her family are British citizens who have done charitable work in the U.K. they were also given their own cost of arms. But tacky Thomas and Samantha are not British citizens and they have done nothing positive for the United Kingdom and there is no protocol, no precedent whatsoever that the queen could find to justify giving them a coat of arms. So Samantha went on television and then distressed and attacked Queen Elizabeth for that but Piers Morgan never addresses that because it doesn’t fit in to his narrative’s main motive which is to get even with a Meghan for moving away from their friendship. She was encouraged by the RF to cut her Media ties and only go through the royal ROTA. Piers should know that. And Piers Morgan gets on television and talks about his great affection for Queen Elizabeth and how concerned he is for her yet he adds to the tremendous angst of her and the RF with his persistent and extremely raging attacks on Megan and even invites people onto his show who are experts on racial bias in the UK… He specifically invites them for their credentials on the subject and then as they are speaking to the subject that he’s brought them for he persistently cuts them off shouts above them so they cannot be heard because he doesn’t want to admit that there is racial bias in the attacks on Meghan Markle… but when your newborn who is only a few days old is compared to a chimpanzee that is racism. Comparing people of African heritage to gorillas, apes and monkeys is a centuries old racist theme. And then there was the BBC caricature of Megan entitled “the angry black woman” and the caricature image showed Megan as a very dark skinned with very big red lips… Clearly not true to her appearance and clearly racist… She was compared to straight Outta Compton, they claimed that her mother lived in a gang war scarred house in the ghetto….none of which is true. I watched Megan‘s face as she carried out her duties in the United Kingdom and in all of these public appearances she has that same very fixed smile on her face at all times which is the mark of a woman under great stress but determined to maintain control and be graceful under pressure. But other people refer to that smile as arrogance because they’re shallow. I was appalled when Prince William came out after the announcement that Harry and Megan wanted to step back from senior royal positions and stated “I can no longer put my arm around my brother“… What a horrific thing to do and say. Harry has always supported and backed Willam no matter what even when he knew that Willam wasn’t playing straight up with Kate… Harry may have said things to Willam in private about those issues but he always had his back in public… But if you want to talk about arrogance that would be William at a time when his brother needs him the most when he is receiving death threats and his wife is receiving death threats and his child has been compared to a chimpanzee …to come out in public and say I can no longer put my arm around my brother… It’s disgusting and it was hateful. I am so proud of Harry . I am very disheartened that they aren’t even a full two months into their decision to step back from senior royal duties and are just now trying to start earning money to repay Frogmoor, via Home, security, travel expenses, and contributions to help support the patronages that they’ve given their hearts too. I’m proud of Prince Harry for partnering with Bon Jovi for the Invictus games. But I think it’s really sad that just a little over two months in to this new life scenario that the royal family had to snatch the word royal from the brand… they could’ve given it a little time to see what they were going to do and done a royal audit of their finances to make sure that they were not adversely profiting off of the word royal. When you set up to protect the brand you do it by attaching it to various items and purposes which makes it harder for other people to come in and usurp the brand name because it’s of its popularity to use for their own financial gain. It was too soon to just assume that they were actually going to sell hoodies and notebooks with the Sussex royal brand and if they were going to sell notebooks and hoodies with the Sussex royal brand most likely the sale of THOSE products would’ve been contributed 100% to their charities whereas their speaking engagements would’ve covered their personal living expenses and their security and the repayment of frigmore. But they didn’t even get them a chance to get off the ground. While I can see why people feel that Harry attacked his grandmother in the statement on their website I don’t think it was an attack. I think it was a statement of commitment to move forward no matter how many words got taken away from them. The Earl Charles Spencer, brother of the late Diana princess of Wales, said in his eulogy of her that in the last year of her life she showed that she needed no royal title to carry out her particular brand of magic. Neither to Harry and Megan… They are already well known and most of the people around the world love them except for the crazy fringe… They can still carry out their own particular brand of magic and be true to the causes they’ve taken up because of what they believe in. It’s clear to me that when you look back at past press coverage of Diana where she expresses concern for how Harry will be treated and find a place to be true to himself within the royal family she was concerned and right to be concerned…he’s no longer even “the spare”. He can be sacrificed his camouflage for Prince William and the stuff nobody’s allowed to talk about. I’ve watched as he and Megan were left dangling out there and not once did the RF come out from behind their cloud of mystique to defend the truly egregious attacks on Archie and other over the top things… they don’t learn from their past… They keep going back to the same old tired “never complain, never explain“ “keep calm and carry-on“… That’s not always the right thing to do. Sometimes the father needs to be a father and come out and stand up for his son. And that is in essence what so-called “Megxit“ is really about… Harry and Megan were bright with hope for the future on their wedding day… And then the so-called nonexistent racial bias in the UK took over and it created great sensation in the social media and the YouTube channelers and that made money and the tabloids kept it alive because it made money and Piers Morgan kept it alive because it increased viewership. They became a commodity for the worst of humanity. I imagine every night at home was painful trying to go to sleep and not think about what the day has been like. The breaking point was their newborn son being compared to a chimpanzee and no one from the royal family came out on that child’s behalf… No one…and one day Archie will do a little research and he’ll realize that and I bet he’ll feel compelled to ask why. Anybody with a reasonable mind who stands back and looks at this whole scenario would certainly understand why they wanted to step away and try to gain a little control over their own lives… Because as senior royals their hands were tied behind their back‘s while they were literally being pummeled to death in the public arena on their own. But “the firm“ is already intervening and trying to make it hard for them to succeed… So when Harry says just call me Harry he’s just getting prepared for whatever else they’re going to throw at them. All the royal family would have to do is call them to a meeting and say “we don’t feel complete without you… We are your family, we love you and we want you here with us. Come back and we will have your back and we will stand beside you and we will face it all together… Because that’s what families are supposed to do and if Harry and Megan came back and the royal family made it clear that they were welcomed back with open arms and that the assaults and attacks must come to an end and then do a big round of appearances and engagements with them showing unity… They would probably be OK but that isn’t gonna happen. Their loss.

Duchess Meghan is a Black woman with a white father who has two other children from a previous relationship who clearly had no relationship with her. I don’t even want to speculate on how they treated their little Black sister. Fortunately, despite growing up in a fractured family, she was loved and raised to be an educated, strong-willed, independent, nurturing, happy, young woman who did things her way and became a success in her own right. Unfortunately, she’s also very empathetic. Because her fractured family - including her loving father - who now only sees her as a meal ticket, along with racists and people who feel like the most eligible bachelor in the world should have married an English Rose, are attacking her from all sides, I’m sure she feels sad about it. Seriously, who wouldn’t? But the poor man’s National Enquirer gave her a taste of what was to come when she was described as “straight out of Compton” when their relationship became public, followed by a nephew she doesn’t know and couldn’t point out of a lineup deciding to sell marijuana and name it after her to make a quick buck. Of course her loving and fiercely protective husband prepared her as much as he could, so she had a pretty good idea of what she would be dealing with. So while I’m sure she feels sad about this sordid mess, she doesn’t feel bad, because she has nothing to feel bad about. Her distasteful family, the racists, yellow journalists and miserable people aside, and if what we’ve seen so far is any indication, the rest of the world approves. I applaud her.

I think I would answer this by asking .. would you feel bad about this level of scrutiny and bad press? I would hope that the Duchess would be able to brush it all aside, or most of it at least, and take heart in the fact that it is the gutter press and not the real, decent people who are causing this situation. However, we saw, in the past, what this type of scrutiny and bad press did to the Princess of Wales and the Duchess of York, the media are, shame on them, attempting to repeat that history using the Duchess’s of Sussex and Cambridge as their targets. I sincerely wish something could be done about this disgraceful behaviour, it is not freedom of the press, it is not in “the public’s interest” unless the public means evil ghouls that thrive on making decent people miserable and wrecking marriages. I think you can tell that I am quite upset by, mainly, the bad press, I have seen little in the way of good press for many years now sadly.

I think because she lives for “Press” ( as was evident when she did Vanity Fair when she started dating him), she would care about scrutiny, especially because the Palace won’t let her answer or retaliate. I think, her ego aside, she must feel frustrated in many ways. People thought it odd she only invited 1 relative and a handfull of actors to her wedding (not even 1 Ragland aunt to keep her mother company?). That was already a bad sign. Her wedding was only appropriate in the U.S. where we can do whatever we want. Yes, she has no Tig anymore, she must feel frustrated and angry to be holding it all in (her crazy 1/2 sister especially) and not be able to make her own statements. All we see is a woman who must’ve been ashamed of every single relative on both sides. Severe separation disorder but bad press she must hate. Her whole career was made on good press.

I was really happy for them both at first but stories coming out of the palace (and they do) suggest she really is “Princess Pushy” A great turnover of personal staff demanding they are available to answer e-mails at stupid o’clock may be the way of Americans but this is not America. HM has a saying “never rub the people’s noses in our wealth”. HM is very frugal with her spending - rotates her outfits all the time whereas “PP” is spending lavish amounts on new outfits every times she steps out. No-one has denied the story about “PP” upsetting Kate either over Charlotte’s wedding outfit. She was also 100% caught out when she lectured saying she worked p/t to pay back her school fees or at least there has not been a credible denial yet. Her poor old Dad. Comes over as a simple man easily manipulated so why haven’t they given him some help I have also heard a whisper that Harry has changed as well since being married which is incredibly sad as he has so much credit in the bank with the British public. Finally…………..why Morocco I do not understand why they went there - no historic link no new major trade deals if she wanted to lecture to Muslim girls why not go to Bradford. Things will settle with the birth of the baby but I fear they will start up again pdq as she demands more & more. Remember “PP” your role model is HM not Kim Kardashian.

I’m quite sure she does! Even the most confident person can feel like the world is against them if they were treated like she’s been….she is bombarded on all sides and even by family members, the press and the social media-seems like she can’t catch a break. She’s probably developed quite a tough skin but I’m sure at times it becomes way too much especially now that she’s pregnant-listening or reading garbage and BS many times in the negative and rampaging hormones are not a good mix-I feel bad when people comment about everything but no matter she’s got Harry to protect her and I know he would rip the skin right off anybody’s arse if they offend her in some way!

Thank you for the ask to answer, but I do not know the woman personally, and could not possibly care less what she feels about the scrutiny and press. She had more than enough advance warning when she was dating the prince, and now she has the entire staff of the Palace to shield her from unwanted scrutiny. Myself? I have an entire life to live, and cannot work up the energy to be concerned about some woman I shall never even meet. There are more than enough people in my town, and in my life that have serious problems that God is asking me to do something about. To waste any of that time with her would be sinful, I believe, in the extreme.

̷M̷e̷g̷h̷a̷n̷ ̷M̷a̷r̷k̷l̷e̷ ̷ - HRH The Duchess of Sussex I’m sure it must distress her from time to time, but she’s 37, old enough to be considered mature. While it may cause 5 minutes of consternation, she has a lot going on right now. She is still a full-time Royal, she’s heavily pregnant, and she’s recently flown from London to New York and back again, then onto Morocco. She probably hasn’t got enough hours in a day to sit and fret about rumour and gossip. She has recently married a British Prince, earning the status of HRH, has a husband who very clearly adores her, and will be giving birth to her first baby very soon. If I had her life I don’t think the inane scribbling in the press would make me ‘feel bad’.

Yes, of course she feels bad about it! She was pretty much expecting to marry her Prince, have a child with him, and be given a chance to carry out philanthropic work that matters to her. She did marry her Prince. She is having a child with him. She is being given a chance to do philanthropic work. But she also embroiled in a whole sh*t storm of controversy and being vilified by anonymous trolls. Who wouldn’t be feeling bad???

Of course! I think you would have to be a superhuman to not feel bad by all media stories about her and her family issues. How she's supposed ruffling feathers with the royals and not doing things according to tradition etc…I could go on for a long time just listing all the things the press have been focusing on. However I do think that she handles the scrutiny beautifully and very gracefully. I'm not the biggest fan of hers necessarily but it can't be easy and she seems to be trying.

Do you think Meghan Markle feels bad about all of this scrutiny and bad press? I'm sure Prince Harry warned the Duchess about the lies she could expect. Having grown up in this fishbowl and knowing firsthand to what lengths the trash rags will go, he would not have let her walk into it blind. And she's had a psychotic famiky for years, so she knew ehat they were like. There's a reason she hasn't had any contact with her half-siblings in 10 years, after all. Since the hatred started even before the wedding, the Duchess had a taste of it and could have walked away. I'm sure no one would have blamed her. But she's made of sterner stuff, obviously. And that's exactly what she needs to be.

As I've said elsewhere on Quora, when she was an actress she said that she never, ever, read reviews. I doubt that has changed now she's a Royal, and, given the birth of her first baby is imminent, I would say that she has a great deal more, of much greater importance, to occupy her thoughts. She has been met with warmth and support whenever she has been out on official business so no, why should she care, even if she is aware? The gutter press are what they are and are aptly ‘named'.

I hope she doesn’t, because she oughtn’t. The ghouls that call themselves journalists only want to sell papers, any way they can. They hounded poor Diana. But the Duchess of Sussex is no fragile flower. She is used to the spotlight and public recognition. She is made of sterner stuff, which is why Prince Charles refers to her affectionately as “Tungsten”. She recognises that this kind of thing comes with the job, and I think she will handle it just fine. Her biggest challenge may be to curb her high-spirited nature and continue considering her wardrobe choices when in public and amongst the other royals. Hers was a quick courtship and short engagement - she didn’t have the benefit of several years to prepare for this, as did the Duchess of Cambridge. But I think she’s off to a good start and I wish her the best.

Why should she? The only thing she did wrong was marry a prince. As a consequence she made herself a target for rubbish newspapers like The Daily Mail, Sun etc. with their thinly-veiled racist agendas as well as all those sad individuals who develop and share every conspiracy theory laid before them no matter how bizarre or foolish. She would be a lot happier if she was just left to get on with her life. But that wouldn’t sell newspapers.

Thanks for your A2A Shelley. If she has any sense, she probably doesn’t even look at the press stories. I think it’s something the Royals learn quickly not to do. They will have staff that scour the clickbait and stories to make sure there isn’t anything worse than unnamed sources with this and that nonsense. If something that could threaten their security or the children are being targeted, that’s usually when the Palace makes an official comment. I should think they are far too busy to spend their time flicking through all the media outlets looking at the next bit of nonsense that is being said about them in general, and Meghan in particular.

I’m sure she does but it is reported that she doesn’t read a lot that is said about her. Being an actress and being online has prepared her for both the flattery and the trashing. She really has not done anything wrong but to the media and “haters” that means nothing; take a picture and make up a negative speculative story and spin it as long as it sells. That’s how the world turns for the rich and famous.

I hope she doesn’t read much of it, since she can’t directly reply to it I find it very unfair. Some of the foolish gossip is just that, but others are hurtful. Right now the British press is trying to present her as difficult and hard to get along with while her half sister writes books on how stuck up she is because she’s not sending Sister Dear the crown jewels. So she’s getting it from both sides. On everything, from the way she cradles her pregnant belly to the - horrors- dark nail polish she wore one night. Given how the Royal Family has behaved in the past, with Charles adulterous lover next to him all cozy, you’d think wearing a dark shade of nail polish could go unnoted.

Of course, the Duchess of Sussex has chosen not to use her maiden name after her marriage to Prince Harry. Some people insist on calling her by her maiden name. Whilst rude, I doubt that she is affected by this. And she has had her own publicity in her successful career as an actor. She knows that haters gonna hate. So no. I am sure that she has the poise and style to ignore haters, and to enjoy her loving relationship with her husband, and look forward to the birth of their child without being affected by venomous toads.

I don't think she's feeling bad about it I think in her inner self she's bluddy fedup with it all.I don't know why people are so jealous of her they should all mind their own business .she's not long b4 she gives birth I do hope she has no problems considering all the grief she's been getting.I'm not a royalist but we have a lovely Queen and I admired Diana and it's a pity she's not here today at least she would have supported her wee Harry's wife good luck to her.

How would you feel if your father started bad mouthing you and you new in-laws, all over the media outlets? You should be asking about him and why he has done what he has. The straw that broke the camels back for Meghan was his giving details of a personal and private letter from her to him, to the press, and in installments for god’s sake! It’s him that has given the media the dubious ammunition to virtually harass Meghan, and in a smaller way, Harry. Her father is the one people should be wondering about. Meghan is fitting into her new, and new it still is, role remarkably well. She is proving a fine addition to ‘The Family’

Well, no one feels good about negative press coverage or internet attacks, but she does seem to know who she is and like it. She was a celebrity before she met Harry, so although nothing like she has now, she got a good amount of scrutiny for years. So, I’m guessing she does a pretty good job of handling all this. Her own inner strength will always serve her well, but she also has the support and love of her husband, her mother and several key members of the royal family.

I believe she does, which is why she is working so hard to create another image of herself that rises above all the nonsense. Her family is batshit crazy. Her father, bless him, has been led very astray and may not ever get back. For the siblings, it’s all money, has been from before she even MET Harry. She always complained that Meghan didn’t buy her a house or give her money for expenses. So I believe she feels bad and is trying to turn it around in the media by working so hard on stuff

Do you think Meghan Markle feels bad about all of this scrutiny and bad press? I would imagine that she isn’t happy that she has been the target of racist and abusive bullying, but she’s apparently happily married to her prince, with a baby due any moment, with an active charitable life, and I doubt she has much time to notice the abusive idiots who live to make themselves feel superior by slagging her off.

No, she has been briefed and realises that there is little she can do about it. There are many uncommon things about her position, some good, some bad. She has accepted the whole package. One of the good things is called ‘Harry’. One day she might come to regret the decision to accept the deal, but I wouldn’t bet on it, and it won’t be anytime soon.

I hope she does not feel bad. She is a well educated girl with a degree from the highly competitive Northwestern University. She starred on a highly successful and popular Suits program for 7 years. She is used to hard work and pressure. I hope she is not reading all of the drivel, ignoring her family who views her as a meal ticket, and enjoying her new marriage and expecting their first child.

I Would. There is nothing worse than gossip The Duchess of Sussex might have a advantage being a actor in her former life all the critism might roll of her like water of a ducks back Her Royal Highness must of known the pressures she would experience for sure Prince Harry must hsve talked about Princess Diana His late Mother Re the Hounded by the media the gossip and downright spiteful talk Prince Harry must have warned Meghan about The pitfulls of being newest Member of the Royal family I hope she can hold out O

I doubt that much of it comes to her attention. The royal family members all get criticized from time to time. They would need psychiatric help if they didn’t ignore it. Meghan is no doubt well aware of her half-sister’s toxic remarks since they started before she and Harry got married. I think now she just tunes it all out. She has nothing to do with her half-sibs, and I don’t think she cares what the trash media and a lot of strangers think.

Her name isn’t Markle any more - let’s respect her marriage and choices and not call her that. I’m sure it’s frutrating, but she chose this life, and knew what she was getting into. She can’t be surprised. She’s old enough to remenmber her late mother in law, and the ridiculous pursuit by the media. The trade off for the privileges she has is crutiny and bad press. Now - what do you say we don’t give her any moroe of that here?

Hello dear. How are you today… Yes. I believe she does though she may appear not to. She is only human and has to keep up appearances. Then again, she needs to pray that all ends well cause such stuff screws up careers. I hope things work out for her so that she can live her life. What do you think dear?
IMHO, no I don’t . She is a media hound, and as long as her name is ‘out there’ I believe she is pleased.

If she does she is not showing it. She walks around with her head held very high. She waves and smiles confidently. She might just be saying something like: “ I really don't care what people say or think about me, I am where I wanted to be , eat my shorts".

She must be wondering why everyone seems to have turned against her. I do think that the media is stirring things up, why I just can’t imagine. I personally feel that it is a huge shame that she can’t be left to settle in and find her place within the Royal family. She appears to be very well-intentioned and Harry loves her. Give the woman a chance!
I don’t think the woman feels anything except a need to be loved, admired, followed, and the centre of attention.

I hope not - she is going to have a baby. Mental health is significant to new mothers. Steeping more stress on the woman and silliness only hurts that new life in the end. Perhaps that is what they are going for though.

It shows that she has and never had absolutely no appreciation for what she was getting into when she married a prince, any prince and particularly a prince from England’s royal family. I do not think that this union will survive for very long. But am willing to be surprised , We will see .
I doubt that she feels bad, even if she does get to see or hear it. Remember what Prince Phillip nick-named her…tungsten.

Surely Markle is not so naive to think she can marry into the Royal Family and not be scrutinized by the media and would not get any bad press, She is a public figure and public figures are open game when it come to the media.

Of course she does. She wasn’t raised to live like a queen (in the real life, a real queen). You can look back to her mother in law (Diana), and you can see that. Willian by other said always had the press all over him.
Sure she does. The worst of it is that it is her own family who are inflicting this suffering upon her.

From what I read it was bothering her so she quit reading it and started ignoring it all. She can’t post responses anyway. It’s againsts Duchess/Royalty house rules. So she just doesn’t pay attention.
Of course. Prince Charles may have nicknamed her tungsten, but even that rare element has a melting point, and she’s been through quite a bit of fire.
Any press is good press as the saying goes.
Just short and sweet. She has bad press, that goes with the job, of being in the public eye. Who knows what we read is true !!
